subject: Re: [junit] Hello
msgSnippet: ... I don t really think that the sender of these mails is the real owner of the mail address (KAhmed@webMethods.com). This problem has infact hit many
messageBody:
[05/30/2006 11:26 PM] J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> KAhmed wrote:
>
>> i attached the details.
>
> You really need a better virus scanner. Three strikes and we suspend the
> account. That's strike two.

I don't really think that the sender of these mails is the
real owner of the mail address (KAhmed@...).
This problem has infact hit many yahoogroups and I really
think its some kind of hack or malware program running on
the host machine.

Infact I get similar messages on one of the groups I own,
all sent using my email id! I contacted yahoo groups and
am yet to hear from them. They would most probably file
it under illegal impersonation and close the request :(

You better keep a close watch Joe, should this mass mailer
(by mass mailer I mean its really bad, it hit one of the
unmoderated F1 groups I belong to and we had like 30 such
messages sent in one go) hit this group more further, you
won't be able to have unmoderated members anymore! :(

Anand

--
"That's the second consecutive Sunday a good race has been spoiled by
necessary penalties, I'm afraid. I mean, you can't even stop and talk to
the policeman and try and talk your way out of that and pretend you're
on your way to your wife having a baby or something, can you You're
nicked and that's it, and you've gotta come in, argue about it later
with the judge."
